question:

I can only pick up or unstack one block at a time.
I can only pick up or unstack a block if my hand is empty.
I can only pick up a block if the block is on the table and the block is clear. A block is clear if the block has no other blocks on top of it and if the block is not picked up.
I can only unstack a block from on top of another block if the block I am unstacking was really on top of the other block.
I can only unstack a block from on top of another block if the block I am unstacking is clear.
Once I pick up or unstack a block, I am holding the block.
I can only put down a block that I am holding.
I can only stack a block on top of another block if I am holding the block being stacked.
I can only stack a block on top of another block if the block onto which I am stacking the block is clear.
Once I put down or stack a block, my hand becomes empty.
Once you stack a block on top of a second block, the second block is no longer clear.

[STATEMENT]

My goal is to have that the orange block is on top of the blue block. I want to minimize the time taken to achieve my goal.
My plan is as follows:

[PLAN]
unstack the blue block from on top of the orange block
put down the blue block
pick up the orange block
stack the orange block on top of the blue block
[PLAN END]
The total time to execute the plan is 4 minutes.

My plan is as follows:

[PLAN]

answer:
Based on the initial conditions and goal, the objective is to get the orange block on top of the red block. Currently, the red block is on top of the blue block and the yellow block is on top of the orange block. Both the blue and the orange blocks are on the table, and the hand is empty.

To achieve the goal, first unstack the yellow block from on top of the orange block, since the orange block needs to be clear for further manipulation. This action will take one minute. Next, put down the yellow block so that your hand is free to pick up other blocks, which takes an additional minute.

With the hand now free and the orange block clear, pick up the orange block from the table. This will take one minute. Finally, stack the orange block on top of the red block to achieve the desired configuration. This final action will also take one minute.
